arts.ttl: Ricken confirms Kovac will be new Dortmund coach
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund's managing director for sport, Lars Ricken, has confirmed that Niko Kovac will be the club's new head coach.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Borussia Dortmund Win 3-1 to Qualify for the Champions League Playoffs
arts.sum: In his second game as Borussia Dortmund’s interim head coach, Mike Tullberg helped steer BVB to a 3-1 victory against Shakhtar Donetsk in the Champions League . Ramy Bensebaini capitalized with ten minutes left in the game, scoring with a delightful chipped finish, giving Tullberg his first win as Borussia Dortmund's head coach.

arts.ttl: Champions League knockout draw: Date, possible fixtures, format, bracket
arts.sum: The draw for the knockout playoff round of the new-look UEFA Champions League is upon us. Here's when it takes place and how it works.

arts.ttl: Guirassy stars as Dortmund defeat Shakhtar Donetsk
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund took on the challenge of Shakhtar Donetsk this evening for Matchday 8 of the UEFA Champions League. The outcome was decided by goals from Serhou Guirassy and Ramy Bensebaini.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund reach agreement to appoint Niko Kovac
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that Niko Kovac is on the verge of becoming Borussia Dortmund’s next head coach. The Bundesliga side have reached an agreement with the former Eintracht Frankfurt, Bayern…

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Borussia Dortmund vs. Shakhtar Donetsk
arts.sum: Official team news has just been released for Die Schwarzgelben who conclude the group phase by hosting Shakhtar Donetsk on Matchday 8 of the UEFA Champions League.

arts.ttl: Champions League final group games: join us for updates on all 18 matches – live
arts.sum: Updates from a tantalising final round of games Manchester City v Club Brugge – live updates Live scoreboard | Who needs what | Email Scott Welcome to chaos. There are 36 clubs playing 18 fixtures to determine which eight qualify automatically for the Round of 16 and which 16 go into the play-off round. Here are those fixtures … Aston Villa v Celtic Barcelona v Atalanta Bayer Leverkusen v Sparta Prague Bayern Munich v Slovan Bratislava Borussia Dortmund v Shakhtar Donetsk Brest v Real Madrid Dinamo Zagreb v AC Milan Girona v Arsenal Internazionale v Monaco Juventus v Benfica Lille v Feyenoord Manchester City v Club Brugge PSV v Liverpool Red Bull Salzburg v Atletico Madrid Sporting v Bologna Sturm Graz v RB Leipzig Stuttgart v Paris Saint-Germain Young Boys v Red Star Belgrade Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund confirm Mike Tullberg will remain on the bench against Heidenheim
arts.sum: BVB sporting director Lars Ricken has confirmed that Borussia Dortmund's search for a new permanent head-coach will stretch through the weekend.

arts.ttl: Mats Hummels on Borussia Dortmund crisis: “Some things one can see coming.”
arts.sum: Never shy about expressing his opinion, German footballing legend Mats Hummels has weighed in on the current Borussia Dortmund crisis.

arts.ttl: Five Borussia Dortmund teenagers to watch with Mike Tullberg in charge
arts.sum: Julien Duranville has racked up a goal, an assist and 14 appearances all told since making his senior Dortmund debut on the final day of the 2022/23 season, and is still four months inside his 19th birthday. A left-footed right winger, Cole Campbell can operate on either flank, but is at his most dangerous cutting inside on his stronger foot, which was the route to most of his 21 goals and 22 assists for BVB's academy teams.
